decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 23001 (P) 020 EXISTING SITE PLAN; 23001 (P) 021 EXISTING GROUND & FIRST FLOOR PLANS; 23001 (P) 022 EXISTING SECOND FLOOR & ROOF PLANS; EXISTING FRONT & REAR ELEVATIONS; 23001 (P) 024 EXISTING SIDE ELEVATION/ SECTION AA & SECTION BB; 23001 (P) 120 B PROPOSED SITE PLAN; 23001 (P) 121C PROPOSED GROUND & FIRST FLOOR PLANS; 23001 (P) 122 D PROPOSED SECOND FLOOR & ROOF PLANS; 23001 (P) 123 D PROPOSED FRONT & REAR ELEVATIONS; 23001 (P) 124 C PROPOSED SIDE ELEVATION/ SECTION AA & SECTION BB
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow amendments in relation to planning permission reference 233139FUL dated 30/11/2023 for 'Conversion of existing building into 3 self-contained flats; single storey rear extension; insertion of a Juliet balcony  in lieu of the window at the first floor rear elevation; roof extension to rear (main) roof slope including the formation of a terrace; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roofslope incorporating a Juliet balcony; and installation of three roof lights to front roof slope', seeking for relocation of proposed rooflight and internal layout adjustment.
